videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Yu-Gi-Oh player reviews the weakest cards ever banned
videos.description:
In today's video @Cimoooooooo tries to guess if cards were banned in their Block formats, something Wizards used to take very seriously.

Hear more Cimo yapping: https://youtu.be/eS528QXQzMc?si=Qev7OBEtcQZIg2oQ
